content.rendered:
About This Service

The S-Anon Family Groups are a fellowship of the relatives and friends of sexually addicted people who share their experience, strength and hope in order to solve their common problems. Individuals can access a searchable database to find face-to-face, phone/ Skype and online meetings.

About the Provider

The S-Anon Family Groups are a fellowship of the relatives and friends of sexually addicted people who share their experience, strength and hope in order to solve their common problems. Our program of recovery is adapted from Alcoholics Anonymous and is based on the Twelve Steps and the Twelve Traditions of Alcoholics Anonymous.

Other Info

Website: http://www.sanon.org/find-a-meeting/

excerpt.rendered: Groups for those affected by a loved one’s sex addiction.
